name: Offshorent Pvt Ltd
description:
Offshorent designs and develops web (custom or themed), mobile apps (native or hybrid) and ecommerce sites/apps in multiple platforms.  We work with a number of digital marketing agencies and software product companies as their backend design or development team. In Philadelphia alone we work behind the scene for 14 digital agencies. We are flexible in how we work.  Our core values are
Transparency
Pride of ownership
Client Care
Innovation
Respect
Efficiency
